website_summaries.verdict: The V-Moda Forza Metallo Wireless earphones deliver fantastic sound quality in a design that's better suited for everyday listening than working out.
cons: Too much cable slack isn't ideal for exercise

customer_reviews.title: I did not think the quality of the sound was as good as the Senn
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are quite "back heavy" and this meant on a few occasions they felt as if they were going to fall out. I did not think the quality of the sound was as good as the Senn. Momentum Free's that I purchased, and hence why I decided to keep those instead. These have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Research paid off! Audiophile quality
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research before purchasing these earphones. I have had some true wireless earbuds in the past that have left me disappointed with audio quality and I feared wireless earbuds might not be quite there yet for an audiophile. I decided to try out neckband wireless and I am extremely impressed with the audio that these deliver. The build quality is excellent, a great metal finish whilst still remaining very light weight. My only reservation that I have noticed is that the connection can drop/distort from time to time. Would 100% recommend these earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: these are the best necklace earphones you can get
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate, these are the best necklace earphones you can get. The necklace design on all others I’ve seen are ugly and intrusive. These are sleek, with a fantastic design, easy to use and most importantly sound fantastic. May lack a bit of mid for some audiophiles, but if you want perfect balanced sound out and about, you’re much better off with a wired pair. My Bose QC’s have t come out since I’ve owned these.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair and the same issue. Such a shame
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favourite earphones for over 2 years. I would wear earphone all day and night for work and pleasure. They are light, comfortable and easy to use but the same issue means I am moving on to another brand. Put simply the volume automatically beeps and continuously reduces to nothing, constantly. A sensor may be loose or some of the firmware is not debugged but it happened again on my 2nd par within 3 months of ownership. I am really disappointed as they are a great product but I need the quality to improve before I return.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: One word... amazing. Honestly I'm so glad I bought these. They have the exact same amzimg sound quality you would expect from the original wired versions. I was a little shocked at the beginning because they were a little quiet but they have they own controls, on the earphone wire, that go even louder than the phone volume settings. I also love that it can simultaneously content to two devices so you can go from phone to tablet without fiddling with wires or settings.
customer_reviews.author: Sohail

customer_reviews.title: tell yourself your playlists deserves better, you deserve better
customer_reviews.text: Im 53 (oldskool rava), tell yourself your playlists deserves better, you deserve better, get these mini monsters. Fall in love with your tunes all over again. Call handling quality only fair. Easy 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: poor - dead after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: After 11 months light use they are unusable because of intermittent crackling noise and gaps in signal ..
customer_reviews.author: stupormundi

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Okay sound quality - nowhere near the Bose Q35s, but these are only in-ear I suppose - but I bought them for the battery life, which is pretty exceptional
customer_reviews.author: alaugharne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for such tiny headphones — easy to forget your wearing them iPhone 6 and 8 compatable
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bruce E Rutland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy that they offer different size of earbuds covers, or I won't wear it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed; these were a gift and broke after 3 months and we had to get a refund. Got some new ones at a fraction of the cost which are better quality
customer_reviews.author: SNSto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Easy to setup & use. I would certainly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to grumble about here. Audio and battery life is amazing the best headphones I've ever owned .
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Trowill

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these headphones. They turn up in a very nice package, the build quality appears very impressive, and they sound incredible. I liked them so much that when the battery blew within two weeks of owning them, I decided to get a replacement rather than looking for another product... Then the second pair stopped working within a week, this time through Bluetooth connectivity issues. The volume and pause keys also appeared to not be working. Perhaps I've just hit a whole new level of unlucky, however I can't help but think that headphones in this price range should have more stringent post-build testing systems in place. Unfortunately I will now be looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Vince

customer_reviews.title: Sounds quality is okay but poor for headphones at this price
customer_reviews.text: Very disapointing! Sounds quality is okay but poor for headphones at this price. The cables are too long meaning you constantly have them irritating your face. The connectivity doesn't work as stated so switching between devices is a complicated sequence of Bluetooth switching and restarting devices. The battery indicator (a series of noises whilst playing) is far from clear and often inaccurate so you will have little idea of remaining battery. The Bluetooth also cuts out regularly whilst in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Simon Kirkham

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: Had them about 3 weeks. Great sound and fitting options. Neck band flaps around when doing vigorous exercise. Unfortunately at the 2nd week I couldn't turn them on in the Gym. I left them on charge a couple of days and was able to get them working again. The following week a similar thing happened but this time they just stopped working with no warning. Even charging for a couple of days couldn't wake them up this time so had to return them for a refund. They were used on average 5 times a week for 2hrs a time and charged in the car.
customer_reviews.author: CDE

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews of these and was pretty excited but in the end was utterly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Over priced and really disappointing. I read the reviews of these and was pretty excited but in the end was utterly disappointed. The volume does not rise much at all and after only 2 months of use, they simply stopped working and would not turn back on. On top of this, they are one of the most expensive on the market. I would not buy them. I emailed the seller to discuss the volume issue and they suggested that this was a common concern and then I emailed them several times after this about my disappointment in them and never heard from the them again. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Coulloupas

customer_reviews.title: Not working well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. The form factor is good and very comfortable. Light enough that you don't really notice them once on. Sound quality was very good. But not super loud. However the Bluetooth sound kept glitching. A little stutter or crackle very couple of songs when streaming from Spotify. For the record I am using a oneplus 3T and Spotify. I tried both downloaded and streaming content had the same issue. Also try iplayer. Same problem. Pairing with the phone was fine but pairing with Windows 10 lenovo think pad laptop seemed to take a long time. Different headset (leophile zero) don't seem to have the same issues. Also has longer battery life and wired option.
customer_reviews.author: AC London

customer_reviews.title: ... bought a series of Bluetooth headphones looking for the perfect pair. This Forza metallo are great and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a series of Bluetooth headphones looking for the perfect pair. This Forza metallo are great and I would recommend them to everyone as long as they understand a couple of kaveats. First, the wire is simply too long. I believe this is so that they can be wrapped around the ear, but I am not sure. Second, when you get a call the headphone vibrates very agressively and does not pulse. It is one long consistent vibrate which is very obnoxious. Other than that, the comfort is fantastic, the sound is as good as anyone could expect for Bluetooth, and the battery usually lasts 2-3 days for me.
customer_reviews.author: TrentonL

customer_reviews.title: A Fool and His Wonderful New Earbuds Are Soon Parted - Highly Recommended However!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound, fit, quality and looks of these bluetooth earbuds. Unfortunately a fool and his earbuds are soon parted, and on my first road trip to Nashville for the eclipse last month they were most likely lost (misappropriated, possible, but I doubt it) somewhere between the plane, Nashville airport, two Ubers, my son's apartment and my AirBnB, Fun while it lasted. Highly recommend, just be more responsible than I was. No way will my better half let me shell out this kind of money for another set lol.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The Bad 1.Left bud required a slam to get the buzzing to stop. 2.The headset turns off the charging. 3. Sounds and tones For connections. 4. Unbalanced and fall down my back. My neck is 18inch. Very annoying. 5. Phone calls are very quiet compared to music. 6. Buds just hang. Always in the way. The Good 1. Comfortable in till it falls. 2. Ear buds fit very well. I put them on my mpow. 3. Charging cable is very long. Also use it with my mpow.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Havoc

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection cuts out repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because I have another V-MODA product (headphones) which are superior to any others I have owned including Bose. But, this product is not up to their standards. Bluetooth connection cuts out repeatedly with my iPhone and iPad, sometimes every few seconds. If you disconnect the BT connection and reset, the cutouts become less frequent but do not stop. The cut outs are like a brief blip but become terribly annoying. The length of the cord to the ear pieces are way too long causing the neck piece to slide down your back. Battery life is a plus but this product is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Besides the bad range these are great. However I'm not very confident with them in the rain as it has no official water resistant rating. Sound review: these have a mellow warm sparkly tone that works good for fast energetic music. Bass isn't crazy but it's there and the mids can seem hidden in very congested music.
customer_reviews.author: Leonidas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. While I am not an audiophile, I think the sound is very nice for ear buds and the battery longevity is superb. Suits me very well while traveling and even when I do not want to hold my phone to my ear. The range of the Bluetooth is among the best I have experienced in iPhone accessories! The battery has lasted 8-10 hours for me.
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones compete with my full can Meze 99s, which are also stellar. I am shocked both by the size of these in-ear drivers and the expansive sound they provide. Clean bass, not muddy at volume, clear mids and highs with great separation. Bottom line: so glad I chose these bluetooth phones. Light, great fit with many ear size options. I do with the wraparound band had an adjustable length, but they fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Sounds great and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Sounds great and fits great. Obviously, don't do exercises on your back with these and expect them to stay on perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, horrible design.
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything about these headphones is above average. The only problem I have is they won't stay around your neck. The design is such that they fall off yyour neck and onto your back with no more movement than turning your head. I read reviews that stated this, but most said, "I have a small head/neck, so maybe someone bigger might lot have a problem." I have a 20" neck and a fat head, and that might even be worse. The quality of these is top notch. The design is garbage. I want to like them because of all of the good points, but if they fall off you, they are simply no good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you think that your super duper Beats sound awesome, you have to try these. I was positively surprised, and I won't change it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dexi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these ear buds, in call use was okay nothing stellar in that department. Music end was really good, really clean clear. Did not have much on the bass end of it but I specifically wanted them for calls. The thin ultra light design is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best Headphone ever used. Excellent sound quality. Good Battery life. Sound performance through V-moda is unbeatable. Received product before expected time. Appreciate Seller Tokyo Honpo, well packaged and for fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Somcyn John Thazhompadickal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for the base since I like to hear base in my music. The base is definitely there and overall the sound is amazing - very clear! Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Pearsons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deskjob headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you want to pretend that you are still relevant, just put these badboys on under your collar and bust out some Thundercat. You can almost pretend to understand the younger generation while revisiting you favorite Asia album.
customer_reviews.author: Byz Andular

customer_reviews.title: It's has nice sound but one thing i found too annoying - ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this headphones. It's has nice sound but one thing i found too annoying - the plastic House Lanyard its too heavy and whenever you sit back or bend doing workout it's always wear off and gets lost somewhere behind the neck. The second think i'd rather say disadvantage is that there are no customization possibilities. A little bass boost is required
customer_reviews.author: Ackle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, make sure you buy warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these headphones. I've treated them properly and card for them and I've had to replace them twice already. One because the battery overheated and died and now the right ear bud is dead. I won't be buying v-moda again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Harris

customer_reviews.title: These are a great set of Bluetooth ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of Bluetooth ear buds. The only hangs up I have is they have a attendance of sliding down my back while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but BT signal too easily blocked.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth reception blocked too easily by your own body/posture. Fast charge but less battery life than anticipated. Good sound, convenient controls, easy pairing/connection. Good call quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Brand

customer_reviews.title: Bass and volume levels limited; cord length a bit too long
customer_reviews.text: I wish the volume limit was increased. I have to occasionally adjust the bass levels via Spotify equalizer in order to minimize distortion. Overall these are a fantastic pair of Bluetooth headphones, they pair easily, hold a great charge, and are flexible. Another issue is, yes, the cords are a bit on the lengthy side and I need to readjust the neck portion back onto my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound is very good. Long life battery. But it has too long wire.
customer_reviews.author: Teera

customer_reviews.title: the Bluetooth headset functionality for calls while wearing it is tin can on a string tier.
customer_reviews.text: absolutely garbage. the call quality is like talking to someone through a bloody tin can on a string and the positioning of the microphone means that every time you move your head the person on the other end of the line is treated to the lovely sound of fabric rustling against the line. honestly they should be embarrassed to call this product luxury if i get better sound quality during calls out of a 20 dollar Plantronics earpiece. this has been the single worst product I've ever bought at this price point and I'm honestly shocked at how many positive reviews there are.
customer_reviews.author: Dankman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you avoid this headset..
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first headset 3 months ago, and it only lasted three weeks. Power for on off wouldn't work, and neither did the other buttons. I ordered my replacement headset a month ago, and just 4 weeks later it keeps turning it self on and off, and I can't make it stop. It continuously buzzes, and all I can do is wait for the battery to die. As of now I can't order another replacement, and I'm out $170 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley W.

customer_reviews.title: Superb all around.
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday. Took today for a 10k run. So far, excellent impressions. Sound is superb. And I mean it in comparison to Bose and Dr. Dre wireless sport versions. It sits very snug and tight in your ear throughout the entire run. Wireless connection was steady. The issue with long wires could be bothersome to some degree. But it certainly does not outweigh superb sound quality and overall fit.
customer_reviews.author: T.Rader

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality poor. Not loud enough. :/
customer_reviews.text: Breaks up sounds, even when the device is sitting still next to them. Not loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Puja Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most convienent, confortable, and the best sounding ear buds ive heard in my life. Once you get the correct size's of the interchangable rubber things, they seal up tight, wont fall out, reflecting amazing bass, and treble! Ive bought 2 sets, one for me and another for a fathers day gift. The microphones, phenominal. I use them to tlak on conference calls daily. Did i mention, they fit under a collared mens shirt like a glove? Havent missed a day of wearing these in nearly a month!
customer_reviews.author: Perry Bata

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great for sports, fits perfectly. Would like a little more volume power. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Guidone

customer_reviews.title: Just lasted a month, later people started to complain about not been able to hear me good
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound, but I can’t answer the calls and people can’t hear me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones...when they work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and LG Tone Platinum the same week, so I could compare. In short, I think the V-MODA is superior to the LG Tone in practically every way. I miss only the reaction of earbuds. The build quality of the Forza is so far superior to that of the Tone there is no contest. I think the Forza's audio is fantastic, for earbuds. The variety of fins and tips provided is fantastic: these are the first earbuds I've owned that don't just fall out of my ear on a regular basis. My first pair had major Bluetooth issues that made them practically unusable. The replacement pair work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bluetooth connectivity and comfortable. But has some slight drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear for extended periods but the wings don't fit the earbud very well. In fact, in just one week's wear, I've lost two. That's probably why the manufacturer provides you with a number of them. Pretty good Bluetooth connectivity when outside...blows away the substandard Jaybird X3, which is unwearable outdoors. However, not even close to the quality and connectivity of the Beats X. Good battery life to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: excellent build quality and battery life though sound quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent build quality and battery life though sound quality is slightly less than ideal. Have to be near full volume to be heard over a loud space such as a gym.
customer_reviews.author: glider_driver

customer_reviews.title: Great while they work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband. He loved the look and comfort of them. The first pair had a buzzing sound in the left earbud, exchanged right away with no problem, which was asweome. The next pair worked for about a week, then they began to turn off and on constantly, without even being touched...like something was stuck inside. These would be great if they worked properly, but after two tries, he's moving onto something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sound good, I kept going back between these and my ...
customer_reviews.text: These sound good, I kept going back between these and my bose soundsport and I think they have better sound overall that the bose bad thing is I used them for about 3 days and the left bud started crackling then died. So I'm returning them and I'm not seeking a replacement. 3 days and it died don't care to get a replacement pair, they don't sound that much better than my bose.
customer_reviews.author: chris reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Horrible..
customer_reviews.text: Horrible...didn’t charge correctly or consistently...didn’t pair with devices. Difficult to use and not worth the money. I’ve returned and will go with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable as proclaimed. My first pair lasted about 3 weeks. I primarily used these in the car and for workouts. In the first case the battery would not charge. Got the 2nd pair after using the warranty. These lasted about a month and they won't pair after a full charge and following the troubleshooting steps from v-moda.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Schick

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect to listen to podcasts while we are
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. It's perfect to listen to podcasts while we are bicycling
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Nagasawa

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. Very comfortable. Very happy with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: The lack of volume speaks volumes
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge van of V-moda headphones however I returned these the same day I ordered them. The volume level on these are terrible. My phone speakers are just as loud as having these in my ears. The actual quality of these are sub-par to LG Tones even though these are significantly more expensive. If you want quality headphones go with an over the ear one from V-moda but avoid this model like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these headphones. So much that I ordered a replacement after listening to the first set with absolutely undynamic sound thinking that I just got a lemon. Very tinny and no lower frequencies. The bass guitar literally disappears when listening to music through them. Unfortunately the replacement set sounds just the same. The design is nice and they fit well, just terrible sound. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thomas DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Stops charging, cheap product with criminal price tag
customer_reviews.text: Battery life gets shorter and shorter before the thing won't even charge anymore. Save your money and never buy this crap. This company should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Staton

customer_reviews.title: Love V-Moda
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge V-Moda fan and have multiple headphones and iems produced by them. There service is by far the industry's best and the products sound and perform well. Have clarified that, this product did not live up to its hype and I had to return it. When paired with my son's phone, it kept losing getting interference, even though it was the only device it was paired to and was generally just a few feet away.
customer_reviews.author: LumbeeChief

customer_reviews.title: I google this headphones, don't trust the reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: i Google the best wireless headphones, and this one was the first top best headphones, but in fact it didn't last a month, this headphones was expensive and now doesn't work, I throw my money to the trash. I will not recommend this headphones, don't trust the reviews in google.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but dont really work im crowded places
customer_reviews.text: Really good. But seems like when you are using them in the gym with a lot of people in it, listing to music on there Bluetooth devices, it starts to lag, stop, scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Nikdk11

customer_reviews.title: No impressed. Boss sport was better.
customer_reviews.text: Bass is weak. Microphone is also weak. Connectivity is good. Wires stick out from my face, look bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Amato

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. Bass presence could be better, otherwise No dropouts, very light, stays in the ears well. it’s very good for a fully wireless non-noise canceling phone.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 7 months now and the power button just stopped working out of no where. Would not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor design
customer_reviews.text: Im on my second pair and am having the same issue i had with the first pair. They are fine at first but the volume on the side with the bluetooth connect button goes almost completly out. Not buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While I loved the functionality
customer_reviews.text: While I loved the functionality, it quit holding a charge after four months of mild to moderate use. The warranty ran our four weeks ago. $170 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Alpern

customer_reviews.title: I like the way they stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they stay in my ears, and the connection is a snap. The reason I only gave it 3 stars is because the volume does not go loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: William Summers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Audio is great, but designing the earphone plugs to loosely hang was a bad idea.
customer_reviews.author: Elia Mtimavalye

customer_reviews.title: Really feeling bad for the outcome
customer_reviews.text: Used it couple of months then one side of the ear phone started losing the quality of sound. Paid alot but very sad to see it not function properly. Couldn’t enjoy it for a year. It’s just months.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Had the headphones for about 4 weeks and the left earbud went out. If you plan on buying a new pair of headphones each month then go with these, otherwise I’d look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Litzler

customer_reviews.title: Just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Sound was ok. They felt cheap to me. For the money you can find better.
customer_reviews.author: Gringo333

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever by V-moda. It's selling on its brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Mayuresh

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they don't fall or slip out when out for a run. I thought the fins would be irritating or annoying but actually found them really comfortable. Completely external sound cancelling and great bass on them :)
customer_reviews.author: Cydnie Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought August 2017. In the last couple of years i have bought 4 or 5 headphones. These are by far the best. Ultraclean sound and very comfortable. I recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

product_meta.title: V-MODA Forza Metallo Wireless in-Ear Headphones - Gunmetal Black
product_meta.description: Color:Gunmetal BlackForza Metalloid wireless is the minimal design, all-day wear, Full featured companion tuned to V-MODA signature 50+ editors' Choice award-winning sound. You cannot lose it or look like you are wearing a “space ring around the collar”! The ergonomic Trap lock titanium neckband ensures the best fit, stability and style in the industry for all-day use. The sound core is a 5. 8mm micro, ultra-lightweight, high-res driver which enables world-class sound. Sweat and weather resistant, Forza Metalloid wireless is the perfect every day and workout companion. Patent-pending detachable Active Flex sport Fins (in 3 sizes) provide maximum stability, flexibility and eliminate cable noise. NC forged from aluminum alloy, Forza Metalloid wireless captures the luxurious, minimal Milano design. The fine-tuned metal casting delivers unrivaled, balanced vibrant bass, vivid midst and vivacious, fatigue-free highs with an unparalleled 3D soundstage. Forza Metalloid in Italian means “metal strength” and Forza Metalloid wireless passes V-MODA strictest durability tests. Enjoy effortless Bluetooth connection within a 33 feet (10 meters) range and simultaneous pairing with 2 devices. The lithium-ion battery provides up to 10+ hours of music and calls. A 15-minute fast Charge delivers 2 hours of playback. Controlling your music, volume, calls and voice assistant has never been easier thanks to the enhanced 3-Button microphone compatible with Apple, Android products & all Bluetooth enabled audio devices. The dual noise-cancelling microphone is business-ready and ensures crystal-clear calls even in the noisiest environments. Discover the V-MODA world via Forza Metalloid wireless and rest assured with Our unrivaled Six-Star customer support, 50% Immortal Life Replacement Program and 1-Year Premier .
feature_bullets: 50+ editors' Choice award-winning V-MODA sound delivered by 5. 8mm ultra-lightweight Hi-Res driver.
Extreme durability Featuring ergonomic titanium neckband and Nano coated to be sweat and weather resistant
Qualcomm apt codec for CD quality wireless audio playback
Detachable Active Flex Sport fins and Milano Design Carrying Case
Bluetooth range of 33 feet (10 meters), up to 10+ hours of continuous music, entertainment and calls; 15-minute fast charge = 2 hours of playback

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars217 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
